attributes.action: grant a Life Peerage for Services to UK Democracy and Politics to whoever leaked MPs expenses to The Telegraph
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Regardless of whether the person has been paid by the paper or not, he or she has performed an immense service to the country, and the country ought to recognise this.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
